debates.showAs: Dog Welfare (Amendment) Bill 2025: Second Stage [Private Members]

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for animal welfare considerations in the operation of dog breeding establishments, including but not limited to a cap on the number of breeding bitches, the age of bitches allowed to breed, the age of pups when removed from their mothers, a staff-to-bitch ratio, and to prohibit the use of surgical artificial insemination; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cúinsí a bhaineann le leas ainmhithe in oibriú bunachas pórúcháin madraí, lena n-áirítear uasteorainn leis an líon soitheanna pórúcháin, le haois soitheanna a gceadófar dóibh pórú, le haois coileán nuair a scarfar lena máithreacha iad, le cóimheas idir foireann agus soitheanna, ach gan bheith teoranta don mhéid sin, agus do thoirmeasc inseamhnú saorga máinliachta a úsáid; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend section 23 of the Wildlife Act, 1976 to include the Sprat Fish, Sprattus sprattus, in the Fifth Schedule of the Act; to prohibit the targeted fishing of sprat except where caught as bycatch; to provide for a moratorium on commercial sprat fishing until sufficient scientific data is available regarding sprat habitats, population dynamics, and their ecological role, to include a Just Transition for inshore fishers; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú alt 23 den Acht um Fhiadhúlra, 1976 chun go n-áireofar an Salán, sprattus sprattus, sa Chúigiú Sceideal a ghabhann leis an Acht; do thoirmeasc iascaireacht spriocdhírithe a dhéanamh ar shaláin seachas i gcás go ngabhtar saláin mar fhoghabháil; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le moratóir ar iascaireacht tráchtála a dhéanamh ar shaláin go dtí go mbeidh sonraí leordhóthanacha eolaíocha ar fáil maidir le gnáthóga an tsaláin, dinimic a lín, agus an ról éiceolaíoch atá aige, lena n-áireofar plean um Aistriú Cóir d’iascairí cladaigh; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Electoral (Home Addresses of Candidates) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to exclude the requirement to publish the addresses of candidates standing for election to County Councils, Dáil Éireann, Seanad Éireann, the Presidency or the European Parliament; to amend the Electoral Amendment Act 2009; to amend the Local Government Act 1994; to amend the Electoral Act 1992; to amend the Seanad Electoral (Panel Members) Act 1947; to amend the Seanad Electoral (University Members) Act 1937; to amend the European Parliament Elections Act 1997; to amend the Presidential Elections Act 1993; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d’eisiamh an cheanglais go bhfoilseofar seoltaí iarrthóirí a bheidh ag seasamh lena dtoghadh chun Comhairlí Contae, chun Dáil Éireann, chun Seanad Éireann, chun na hUachtaránachta nó chun Parlaimint na hEorpa; do leasú an Achta Toghcháin (Leasú), 2009; do leasú an Achta Rialtais Áitiúil, 1994; do leasú an Achta Toghcháin, 1992; do leasú Acht Toghcháin an tSeanaid (Rolla-Chomhaltaí), 1947; do leasú Acht Toghcháin an tSeanaid (Baill Phríomh-Scoile), 1937; do leasú an Achta um Thoghcháin do Pharlaimint na hEorpa, 1997; do leasú Acht Toghchán an Uachtaráin, 1993; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Protection of Hares Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prohibit the granting by the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine of licences for the purpose of hare coursing and to afford the hare species the full protection of the Wildlife Act 1976.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc ar an Aire Talmhaíochta, Bia agus Mara ceadúnais chun críche cúrsála giorriacha a dheonú agus do thabhairt cosaint iomlán an Achta um Fhiadhúlra, 1976 do speiceas na ngiorriacha.

debates.showAs: Electricity Regulation (Amendment) (Protection of Financially Vulnerable Customers) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Electricity Regulation Act 1999 to include the definition of “vulnerable customers” in relation to the functions of the Commission for the Regulation of Utilities; and to allow the Minister for Environment, Climate and Communications to make regulations to that effect.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Rialáil Leictreachais, 1999 chun an míniú ar “custaiméirí soghonta” a áireamh i ndáil le feidhmeanna an Choimisiúin um Rialáil Fóntais; agus dá cheadú don Aire Comhshaoil, Aeráide agus Cumarsáide rialacháin a dhéanamh chuige sin.
bill.shortTitleEn: Electricity Regulation (Amendment) (Protection of Financially Vulnerable Customers) Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Rialáil Leictreachais (Leasú) (Custaiméirí atá Soghonta ó thaobh Airgid de a Chosaint), 2023

debates.showAs: Protection of Children’s Health (Idling of Mechanically Propelled Vehicles in Vicinity of Schools) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide, in the interests of protecting children’s health, for an offence relating to causing or permitting a mechanically propelled vehicle to remain idle in the vicinity of a school, and for those purposes to make certain provisions in relation to the powers of members of the Garda Síochána, the provision of traffic signs and the payment of a fixed charge as an alternative to prosecution for such an offence, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú, ar mhaithe le sláinte leanaí a chosaint, maidir le cion a bhaineann lena chur faoi deara nó lena cheadú feithicil inneallghluaiste a réchasadh i gcomharsanacht scoile agus, chun na gcríoch sin, do dhéanamh forálacha áirithe i ndáil le cumhachtaí comhaltaí den Gharda Síochána, i ndáil le comharthaí tráchta a sholáthar agus i ndáil le muirear seasta a íoc mar mhalairt ar ionchúiseamh mar gheall ar chion den sórt sin, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Protection of Children’s Health (Idling of Mechanically Propelled Vehicles in Vicinity of Schools) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosaint Sláinte Leanaí (Réchasadh Feithiclí Inneallghluaiste i gComharsanacht Scoileanna), 2021

debates.showAs: Just Transition (Worker and Community Environmental Rights) Bill 2021: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Just Transition (Worker and Community Environmental Rights) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Just Transition (Worker and Community Environmental Rights) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of a body to be known as An Coimisiún Náisiúnta um Thrasdul Cóir or, in the English language, the National Just Transition Commission to oversee the bringing together of workers, communities, employers and government in social dialogue to drive the plans, policies and investments needed for a fair transformation to a low-carbon economy; to require the preparation, by certain prescribed bodies, of just transition plans; to provide for the conferral of other functions on the said body; to amend the Climate Action and Low Carbon Development Act 2015 (as amended by the 2021 Act); and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le comhlacht a bhunú ar a dtabharfar an Coimisiún Náisiúnta um Thrasdul Cóir nó, sa Bhéarla, the National Just Transition Commission, chun formhaoirsiú a dhéanamh ar thabhairt le chéile oibrithe, pobal, fostóirí agus rialtais in idirphlé sóisialta, ionas go gcuirfear chun tosaigh na pleananna, na beartais agus na hinfheistíochtaí is gá d’fhonn bunathrú cothrom chuig geilleagar ísealcharbóin a thabhairt i dtír; dá cheangal ar chomhlachtaí forordaithe áirithe pleananna um thrasdul cóir a ullmhú; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le feidhmeanna eile a thabhairt don chomhlacht sin a dúradh; do leasú an Achta um Ghníomhú ar son na hAeráide agus um Fhorbairt Ísealcharbóin, 2015 (arna leasú le hAcht 2021); agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Just Transition (Worker and Community Environmental Rights) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thrasdul Cóir (Cearta Comhshaoil Oibrithe agus Pobail), 2021

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Wildlife Act, 1976 to include the Basking Shark (Cetorhinus maximus) in the Fifth Schedule to that Act; to amend section 23 of that Act to make illegal the intentional or reckless injuring, disturbance or harassment of any protected wild animal other than for the purposes of hunting; and to provide for the drafting of a code of conduct by Ministerial regulation for the purposes of wildlife tourism or recreational activities.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Fhiadhúlra, 1976 chun an Liamhán Gréine (Cetorhinus maximus) a áireamh sa Chúigiú Sceideal a ghabhann leis an Acht sin; do leasú alt 23 den Acht sin chun go mbeidh sé neamhdhleathach díobháil a dhéanamh d’aon ainmhí fiáin cosanta nó aon ainmhí fiáin cosanta a chorraí nó a chiapadh, go hintinneach nó go meargánta, seachas chun críoch fiaigh; agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cód iompair a dhréachtú le rialachán ón Aire chun críoch gníomhaíochtaí turasóireachta nó áineasa fiadhúlra.
